mapper.insert: insert into users (id, name, password, sex, email, phone_num, address, hometown, birthday, register_date) values(#{id},#{name},#{password}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, #{address}, #{hometown}, #{birthday}, now());
mapper.select: select u.id, u.name,u.password, u.sex,u.email,u.phone_num as phoneNum,u.address,u.hometown,u.birthday, u.register_date as registerDate,u.status,u.comment, d.department_id,d.name as department_name,d.description as department_description, r.role_id, r.name as role_name,r.description as role_description from users u left join departments d on u.department_id=d.department_id left join user_role ur on u.id=ur.user_id left join roles r on ur.role_id=r.role_id where u.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update users set name=#{name}, password=#{password}, sex=#{sex}, email=#{email}, phone_num=#{phoneNum}, address=#{address}, hometown=#{hometown}, birthday=#{birthday} where id=#{id}

update users set name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, department_id=#{department.id}, email=#{email}, phone_num=#{phoneNum}, address=#{address}, hometown=#{hometown}, birthday=#{birthday}, status=#{status}, comment=#{comment} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select r.id,r.name from users r where r.department_id like #{departmentId}||'%'
